sect2.title: FormatOperators-Action
sect2.para: The FormatOperators-Action allows to set before and after which operator spaces are inserted.

para.literallayout: The option afterOperator is an array (index is token-constant, value is string with space(s)) which token/operator gets which space before it. The option beforeOperator is an array (index is token-constant, value is string with space(s)) which token/operator gets which space before it.
